drivers: Record Client and Gaming segment revenue

segments.name: Data Center
key_points: Operating loss due to ~$800M inventory charge related to China export controls
EPYC CPU sales set records for cloud and enterprise
Launched MI350 series with volume production ahead of schedule
MI355 matches/exceeds B200 in critical workloads

segments.name: Client and Gaming

client.context: Record desktop CPU sales, rich mix of Ryzen 9000

gaming.context: Strong demand for Radeon 9000 GPUs and semi-custom normalization

key_points: Ryzen adoption accelerated in commercial PCs
Announced multiyear collaboration with Microsoft for next-gen Xbox
Radeon 9600 XT launched for mainstream gamers

segments.name: Embedded
key_points: First production shipments of Spartan UltraScale+ FPGAs
Expect return to sequential growth in H2 2025

gross_margin.context: Down 10 points YoY due to $800M export control charge. ~54% excluding charge.

net_income.context: Non-GAAP EPS $0.48. Inventory charge impacted EPS by ~$0.43.

expectations.revenue_context: Represents ~28% YoY growth. Driven by Data Center double-digit seq growth.
expectations.notes: Does not include any revenue from MI308 shipments to China.

acquisitions.name: ZT Systems
acquisitions.impact: Accelerates rack-scale AI capabilities. Manufacturing business divestiture to Sanmina for $3B.

regulatory.impact: Effective elimination of MI308 sales. $800M inventory charge in Q2. Licenses under review.
